name: Invaders From Skull Nebula
description:
They are coming! They are coming! Hide your children and your bovines. Invaders from another world are here.

A downloadable game for Windows

Invaders from Skull Nebula takes the pop art aesthetics and cheesy dressing of 20th Century Alien B- Movies and mixes it with a fast paced top down shooting experience. 


Placing players in the cockpit of the invading Skull's scout saucer they will have to use not only their superior firepower but also their advanced technology to outlast the human resistance. A tractor beam is the key to victory for the Skull as it is the only means to regain health either from humans or Cows scattered across the Americana landscapes.
